item.title: Hugo Theme ARCHIE
item.description:
Archie - Hugo theme

Archie is a minimal and clean theme for hugo with a markdown-ish UI.

Forked from Ezhil Theme

Demo

Check the Demo hosted on GitHub Pages :smile: . You can find the source code to that in the site branch of this repository

Feature

  • Google Analytics Script
  • Callouts
  • Tags
  • Auto Dark Mode(based on system theme)
  • Dark/Light Mode toggle
  • tl:dr; frontamatter
  • Table of contents
  • Cache busting for CSS files
  • Disqus Comments

Installation

In your Hugo website directory, create a new folder named theme and clone the repo
